name: Motel 6 Dallas - DFW Airport North

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband stays here once a month to visit his kids. I'd stayed here with him several years ago and was not happy - he promised me this time would be different since the renovation. I was very pleasantly surprised - only thing I could really find to complain about is the thin towels - rooms are incredibly spotless - and new decor is very functional and actually pretty attractive - clientele is no longer seedy (a lot of commuting airline crew stay here also). All in all, a hell of a deal - someone is doing this one right!! One of nights we were here some sprinkler heads went off and flooded one entire side of first floor and the next morning we saw workers already pulling out the old flooring and putting in new - the management is definitely on top of things here!
reviews.title: Pretty Unbelievable

reviews.text: Airport shuttle works great also -
reviews.title: Absolutely terrific value for the money

reviews.text: I needed a place just for one night. My usual objectives were met: clean, well lit, airport shuttle service, comfortable bed, good water pressure in the shower. This Motel 6 gets an A+ on offering such requirements. However, just as an FYI, the airport shuttle service took nearly two hours (!) to come pick me up; and, the wake-up service which I requested never rang. Would I return? Yes, I would. Although, if the next time brings a return of the poor shuttle service, I would not stay here for a third time.
reviews.title: This place is Grrrreat!!

reviews.text: Without a doubt the absolute best motel 6 I have ever stayed in-Rooms decorated tastefully but simply- Laminate floors,earthy neutral colors.No ratty gummy carpet here.
reviews.title: Great place for traveling out of DFW.

reviews.text: Premises is clean,well lit and well maintained.Landscaped with flowers and hedges.
reviews.title: I'll be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very modern hotel with welcoming staff. Rooms are a little on the small side but very clean. There are no diners near to the hotel, so we had to use the car to go and eat.
reviews.title: Good clean rooms, but a bit on the small side

reviews.text: My daughter and I stayed at this hotel for a conference we were attending.
reviews.title: If you're in town for a quick trip - this place is worth the value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't make any hotel reservations before we came down, but I knew that Motel 6 would fit in our budget. The rooms are small, they look and feel like a college dorm; but for us, it was perfect. We were in the conference for most of the day, so, just to sleep and relax, it was nice.
reviews.title: A great find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was bummed that I had to pay $2.99 for 24 hour internet access - which I thought was absurd! Most hotels come with free WiiFi, so that was annoying.
reviews.title: Pet unfriendly

reviews.text: The staff was very helpful, friendly and cared about their customers.
reviews.title: Ikea Rooms?

reviews.text: I needed a place to sleep before a flight where I could leave a car and shuttle to the airport. The Motel 6 fit the bill at a reasonable rate ($40).
reviews.title: Well, it's cheap

reviews.text: The good: helpful staff, clean room, good tv reception, nice shower; good HVAC controls.
reviews.title: Tops

reviews.text: The not-so-good: wi-fi costs extra when it works, which it didn't when I was there; the bed is terribly hard, just a mattress on a board; the pillows are just plain terrible; you need two towels they are so skimpy; lots of room-to-room, floor-to-floor, and hall-to-room noise; the airport shuttle runs only once an hour in the mornings.
reviews.title: Has Character - In A Good Way

reviews.text: It is what it is. For my purposes, it was OK and I'll recommend it on that basis, but don't expect too much.
reviews.title: Just Right.

reviews.text: I have spent time at this Motel 6 for at least the past 10 years. We travel all over this country, staying primarily at Motel 6.
reviews.title: Great Value Recently Renovated

reviews.text: This hotel is one of the most clean I have ever seen, they really care about it, and they do a great job to keep everything IMPECCABLE.
reviews.title: Great little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The stuff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Efficiency an a Sea of Expensive Hotels

reviews.text: It worth this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent value
They do leave the "Light On"!!
reviews.text: Their new renovation make it look so NEAT.

reviews.title: A great place to stay.
reviews.text: CIRCUMSTANCE: We live in the DFW area but had an early 6AM departure. We booked online.

aka: Motel 6 Dallas - Dfw Airport North Hotel
